metadata.Title: CVE-2019-14776 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: A heap-based buffer over-read exists in DemuxInit() in demux/asf/asf.c in VideoLAN VLC media player 3.0.7.1 via a crafted .mkv file.

advisory.DiscoveredBy: Antonio Morales from the Semmle Security Team

criterions.comment: vlc package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.8-2').
